tracks.title: Space Walk
tracks.description: Step outside and enter the sky, transcend the light years, and roam the stars.

tracks.title: The Game Is On
tracks.description: Bubble gum, potato chips, and iced soda. All is ready and Silver Wolf's favorite show is about to start.

tracks.title: Science Fiction
tracks.description: While fantasy longs to lead the world astray, science had steadily and soberly chosen its path.

tracks.title: Timeline
tracks.description: Once upon a time, you set foot on your journey from here.

tracks.title: Dawn of Disaster
tracks.description: After the disaster, very few people were willing to investigate whether it was an accidental calamity or a calculated plot.

tracks.title: Take the Journey
tracks.description: No one knows what awaits them ahead on the journey, so just taking this first step can be daunting.

tracks.title: Weightless
tracks.description: The moment when gravity changed, I forgot to even breathe.

tracks.title: Crises
tracks.description: If one can predict future crises and dangers... Pity there is no "if only."

tracks.title: fReeStyLE
tracks.description: Life is like a play, and everyone lives by their ability to perform. Even the most honest person will have days when they need to improv.

tracks.title: Salty Moon
tracks.description: Recipe: Wildfire-soaked maguey, a lemon slice charged with murder, and a handful of salt fermented from the tears of stars.

tracks.title: Embers
tracks.description: It is even a luxury for some people to pass a peaceful day before warm embers.

tracks.title: Fade Sun
tracks.description: There are no major differences between the Belobog of today and the past. The only difference might be the ever-colder nights.

tracks.title: Ghost from the Past
tracks.description: The shadow of destruction still wanders outside Belobog.

tracks.title: Warm Sun
tracks.description: Enjoyable moments are like the warm winter sun. They are fragile and brief, but their momentary warmth soothes the difficulty of the long years.

tracks.title: Order
tracks.description: Like the tall walls blocking the blizzard, an order was erected by the Architects themselves.

tracks.title: Kindling
tracks.description: The blizzard cannot put out all warmth. The final kindling rises from below the earth.

tracks.title: Underground
tracks.description: People are still defending their homes even in the underground world.

tracks.title: Godfather
tracks.description: Everything he did using his power was to protect his family.

tracks.title: Frozen March
tracks.description: Why, when faced with irrefutable strength, is our first thought always to resist, to cover our ears, instead of hearing the call?

tracks.title: A Trap With No Return
tracks.description: Their power is with me... You are but cinders of the Old World soon to become ashes!

tracks.title: Wildfire
tracks.description: You must break the old to build the new.

tracks.title: Everwinter
tracks.description: Humanity's living space grows ever smaller in the ceaseless Eternal Freeze.

tracks.title: Fate
tracks.description: The moment of choice is here. The road to the future is so near yet so far.

tracks.title: HeartFire
tracks.description: Happiness is just having a crackling fire and friends and family by one's side.

tracks.title: Street Abuzz
tracks.description: Only by igniting the dancing bonfire can these people not be forgotten by this frigid planet.

tracks.title: Cumulus Formations
tracks.description: Clear skies, soothed darkness, yet a quick shower followed by sun. Appearing clouds, fading clouds, enigmatic as life itself.

tracks.title: Ave Astra et Viator
tracks.description: The traveler's spirit wanders on, showered in starlight evermore.

tracks.title: Lustrous Moonlight
tracks.description: Stainless is the clear night. The moon is silver bright. Fill my cup, and make sure it brims up.

tracks.title: Fabulous Foresight
tracks.description: Though everything may change in a flash, my strategies can keep things under control.

tracks.title: Upon the Firmament
tracks.description: Gaze up, and study the laws of astronomy. Look down, and observe the features of geography. Only then would the formation of night and day be clear in your mind.

tracks.title: Exquisite Ingenuity
tracks.description: By measuring, the load-bearing of starskiffs derived. By examination, the quality of material determined. Meticulously, detailed blueprints drafted. Meticulously followed, exquisite delves constructed.

tracks.title: Deerstalker
tracks.description: A desperate deer will resort to any means to escape.

tracks.title: Anthropic Domain
tracks.description: The sun rises and sets, the moon waxes and wanes. The days turn, the seasons pass. The land thrives, the people prosper. As the galaxy stretches overhead.

tracks.title: Thundering Chariot
tracks.description: Thunder roars and rumbles, after lightning flashes and tears the skyfall.

tracks.title: Heaven and Earth as a Chessboard (Jing Yuan)
